trans-unit.source: Databases rarely have problems, but this may be helpful if you find some.

seg-source.mrk: Databases rarely have problems, but this may be helpful if you find some.

target.mrk: Databases rarely have problems, but this may be helpful if you find some.

trans-unit.source: If performance is slow, try removing several thousand records.

seg-source.mrk: If performance is slow, try removing several thousand records.

target.mrk: If performance is slow, try removing several thousand records.

trans-unit.source: If none of your commands work, make sure they are SQL commands and not SEQUEL commands.

seg-source.mrk: If none of your commands work, make sure they are SQL commands and not SEQUEL commands.

target.mrk: If none of your commands work, make sure they are SQL commands and not SEQUEL commands.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot get anything to work at all, try uninstalling and reinstalling.

seg-source.mrk: If you cannot get anything to work at all, try uninstalling and reinstalling.

target.mrk: If you cannot get anything to work at all, try uninstalling and reinstalling.

trans-unit.source: For more detailed troubleshooting help, see the online documentation shipped with your database.

seg-source.mrk: For more detailed troubleshooting help, see the online documentation shipped with your database.

target.mrk: For more detailed troubleshooting help, see the online documentation shipped with your database.
